Name: Quilly
About the game: Quilly is a video game prototype created and developed by Ceruk Labs Quilly is a short adventure, taking place in a desolate location. with an experimental design. Several objects will be part of this small experience. After a long time, we finally return with new materials about the game. Now the development is at the stage of the release. So be prepared to see more news from us also later on. We took additional time to significantly improve our product and prepare it for digital distribution. Players will uncover the mystery of Quilly. By the end of this adventure, your destiny will be clear. What's about Climmi. And what more could a person want? You'll meet several friends during your search. There is Denf ... Donna etc. You are in a 2d adventure, your name is Joe and have to solve several tasks to find the laptop of Climmi. Your mouse icon became a cross when you interact with the environment. You can speak, use things at certain stages or walk to an other screen. Do use things: drop them with drag and drop over the desired place or person. So try different things and you''ll find the right answer.
